name: Market Value
description:
It's You VS The Graph.  Will you earn that Market Value?

Market Value is an incremental game where you use a small amount of assets to buy and sell cryptocurrency and stock on a digital market. There are 7 different types of currency with exponentially increasing value for you to rise up to in order to achieve infinite financial stability. You can also hire a marketing team which you can command to buy and sell stock at a set price. Will you be the biggest trader of Bytecoin?

Note: Exiting the game will result in exchange vanishing and stealing all of your money and stock. You will have to restart the game upon re-opening.

Credits:

Programming, Sounds & Trailer created by Ethan Munday (2064568).

Art created by Lucie Sinclair (2013393).

Partial Planning by Thomas Sy (2061178). 

Resources used:
